content: HL7 will host the 22nd FHIR Connectathon in Atlanta, Georgia on September 14 & 15, 2019 and we would like to have your support as a track lead. Please enter your track proposal into CONFLUENCE (under FHIR Implementers) no later than July 31st, 2019 for consideration by the FHIR Management Group. https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/Connectathons
